item.description:
Parking can be difficult but not impossible to find on Newbury Street. If you are coming in from outside the city, I recommend parking a bit farther out and taking the Green Line B, C, or D routes to the Hynes Convention
Center stop, that's just half a block from the Trident.


For more information, see http://www.tridentboo...


But we may well change over to a location that offers far better immediate parking opportunities.
Davis Square in Somerville is a real possibility. The Diesel Cafe there has a large back room
that we might be able to use.
item.how_to_find_us: We're in a period of reorganization just now -- and will try to get things ready for a late-April meeting. Thanks for your patience!
item.why: Pixel pushing in isolation can be tough! Learn something, share experiences with others in the trenches. Network! See what jobs may be opening up. Have some fun! Maybe we can get some guest presenters.

group.name: The Boston Graphic Design Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Graphic Design March-April Meeting, now reorganizing
